Subroutine vom_init_vegpar

690 : 
691 : !+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
692 : !+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
693 : !+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
694 : !*-----Initial values---------------------------------------------------
695 : 
696 :       subroutine vom_init_vegpar ()
697 :         use vegwatmod
698 :         use vegmod
699 :         use watmod
700 :         implicit none
701 : 
702 :         INTEGER :: init
703 :         REAL*8  :: dummy
704 : 
705 :         topt_ = tstart
706 : 
707 :         !     * Set soil moisture and vegetation parameters to initial conditions 
708 : 
709 :         !     * Set init=1 to signalise to waterbalance that this is the inital step
710 :         init = 1
711 :         call waterbalance(init)
712 : 
713 :         if (rootdepth .gt. cz) then
714 :            write(*,*) 'Root depth greater than soil depth'
715 :            rootdepth = cz
716 :         endif
717 : 
718 :         wsold  = SUM(cH2Ol_s(:))               ! initial soil water storage
719 :         wsnew_ = wsold
720 : 
721 :         !     * Set vegetation parameters
722 : 
723 :         md_   = pc_ * mdf + mdstore
724 :         mqx_  = md_ * mqxf
725 :         mqnew = 0.95d0 * mqx_                  ! initial wood water storage
726 :         mqold = mqnew
727 :         rsurfnewvec(:) = 0.d0
728 : 
729 :         !     * Determining the position of the bottom of the tree root zone
730 : 
731 :         pos_ = 0
732 :         dummy = 0
733 :         do while (rootdepth .gt. dummy)
734 :            pos_ = pos_ + 1
735 :            dummy = dummy + delzvec(pos_)
736 :         enddo
737 : 
738 :         !     * Determining the position of the bottom of the tree root zone
739 : 
740 :         posg = 0
741 :         dummy = 0
742 :         do while (rgdepth .gt. dummy)
743 :            posg = posg + 1
744 :            dummy = dummy + delzvec(posg)
745 :         enddo
746 : 
747 :         rsurfgnew(1:posg) = rsurfinit * delzvec(1:posg)
748 :         rsurfgnew(posg+1:M___) = 0.d0
749 :         if (posg .gt. nlayersnew) then
750 :            rsurfgnew(nlayersnew+1:posg) = rsurfmin                        &
751 :                 &                               * delzvec(nlayersnew+1:pos_)      
752 :         endif
753 :         !     * root surface density (root surface area/soil volume) in each sublayer
754 :         rsurfnewvec(1:pos_) = rsurfinit * delzvec(1:pos_)
755 :         if (pos_ .gt. nlayersnew) then
756 :            rsurfnewvec(nlayersnew+1:pos_) = rsurfmin                      &
757 :                 &                                 * delzvec(nlayersnew+1:pos_)    
758 :         endif
759 :         jmax25_(2)   = 0.0003d0
760 :         jmax25g(2)   = 0.0003d0
761 :         pcgmin       = 0.02d0                  ! minimum grass pc; initial point for growth
762 :         pcg_(2)      = MIN(1.d0 - pc_, pcgmin)
763 :         pcg_(:)      = pcg_(2) + (/-0.02,0.0,0.02/)  ! vector with values varying by 1%
764 :         pcg_(3)      = MIN(MAX(pcgmin, pcg_(3)), 1.d0 - pc_)
765 :         rootlim(:,:) = 0.d0
766 : 
767 :         !     * Direct costs
768 : 
769 :         !     * (3.38)  foliage tunrover costs, assuming crown LAI of 2.5
770 :         tc_ = tcf * pc_ * 2.5d0
771 : 
772 :         !     * Setting yearly, daily and hourly parameters
773 : 
774 :         yr_            = year(1)
775 :         !d      netassyr       = 0.d0
776 :         !d      gppyr          = 0.d0
777 :         rainyr         = 0.d0
778 :         paryr          = 0.d0
779 :         radyr          = 0.d0
780 :         vdyr           = 0.d0
781 :         etyr           = 0.d0
782 :         epanyr         = 0.d0
783 :         evapyr         = 0.d0        ! = yearly esoil
784 :         ruptkvec_d(:)  = 0.d0
785 :         ruptkg_d(:)    = 0.d0
786 :         ass_d(:)       = 0.d0
787 :         assg_d(:,:)    = 0.d0
788 :         netassvec(:)   = 0.d0
789 :         netassvecg(:)  = 0.d0
790 :         iocum          = 0.d0
791 :         ! for grasses
792 :         etmg_y         = 0.d0
793 :         assg_y         = 0.d0
794 :         rlg_y          = 0.d0
795 :         rrg_y          = 0.d0
796 :         cpccg_y        = 0.d0
797 :         tcg_y          = 0.d0
798 :         ! for trees
799 :         etmt_y         = 0.d0
800 :         asst_y         = 0.d0
801 :         rlt_y          = 0.d0
802 :         rrt_y          = 0.d0
803 :         cpcct_y        = 0.d0
804 :         tct_y          = 0.d0
805 : 
806 :         return
807 :       end subroutine vom_init_vegpar
